snippet.title: Multiplayer Behind The Scenes - Transformers Fall of Cybertron Official Video
snippet.description:
Available NOW at http://www.transformersgame.com
The Transformers Legend Begins: August 21st 2012 for Xbox 360, PS3 and PC.

Create your own Transformer and battle online in the definitive Transformers video game, Fall of Cybertron. Take your custom or classic Transformer to war on 10 epic battle maps in 5 amazing game modes. Experience intense Co-Op combat in Escalation mode as you and 3 friends fight off waves of enemies.

The Autobots fight for their lives in the last moments of the Transformer homeworld.
Transformers: Fall of Cybertron is the sequel to War for Cybertron, the highest rated Transformers game ever. Coming Fall 2012 for Xbox 360 & PS3. Join the epic battle for survival as the Autobots take their last stand to defend their legendary home planet from the Decepticons.
